data.title: Aggressive Hookah Spy Cam
data.description: Use this Spy Cam + Cyber Cage combo to make it more difficult for the enemy team to hold Hookah and B Site, and make it easier for your team to take space.

data.title: Aggressive A Short Spy Cam to Clear Angles on Site
data.description: Use this Cyber Cage + Spy Cam combo to make it more difficult for the enemy team to hold A Site, and make it easier for your team to take space.
